call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - August 28th

topics.title: Community AMA Format Transition Announcement
topics.summary: AMAs are transitioning from official EF-hosted events to community peer-to-peer format starting next week. This change aligns with Ergo's decentralization goals and will allow all community members to interact directly with core developers like kushti, Joe, and Dan on Thursday mornings.

topics.title: Mark/Kraken Interview Discussion and Hashrate Update
topics.summary: Plans are being coordinated for a livestream with Kraken's Mark, with qx() offering to facilitate between kushti and Joe. Ergo's hashrate has improved from 5 to nearly 8 TH/s recently, showing positive mining network health.

topics.title: InfraDAO Expansion and Load Balancing
topics.summary: A new member, Stroof (an Oracle runner), has joined the InfraDAO with hardware contributions. The infrastructure now features geo load balancing across East Coast US, Australia, and Singapore, routing users to the closest peer-to-peer nodes, GraphQL, API, or Explorer services.

topics.title: Kraken Listing Strategy via Rosen-ERG
topics.summary: Discussions with Kraken revealed the short-term path for listing involves getting Rosen-ERG from Cardano listed first. Joe has proposed airdropping Rosen-ERG to Cardano wallets to meet Kraken's wallet count requirements, with the proposal currently active in Paideia for community voting.

topics.title: InfraDAO Mission and Decentralization Goals
topics.summary: The InfraDAO aims to eliminate reliance on centralized EF servers by creating a distributed network of community-run nodes and explorers. Currently has 3 active members with plans to expand to 10-50 participants, potentially hosting additional services like ErgoMiner instances and SigmaSpace browser.

topics.title: Social Media Volunteer Recruitment
topics.summary: Response to community concerns about inactive Sigmanauts social media accounts. qx() calls for volunteers to help manage posting, offering to start people on Sigmanauts account with potential promotion to main Ergo platform account based on performance.

topics.title: AI-Powered Video Knowledge Base Project
topics.summary: Demonstration of an AI system that can process video tutorials with timestamped subtitles, allowing users to ask questions and receive specific video locations as answers. Plans to implement this for all Ergo tutorials, AMAs, and documentation to improve community onboarding and information access.

topics.title: AI Trading Bots and Community AMA Transition
topics.summary: Brief discussion on AI agent security for trading bots, recommending only small amounts for automated trading. Final reminder about the transition to community-hosted AMAs and encouragement for community participation in the evolution toward true peer-to-peer protocol governance.
